full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED BDUD LAS RNAM RGYAL GYI SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD THAR BAR 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED BDUD LAS RNAM RGYAL @004A *, ,GYI SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD THAR BAR 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I SKU GZHOGS GRVA TSANG DANG SMAN BLA GRVA TSANG MONGS PA'I SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYI DPAL BZANG PO'I RGYUN DU ZHAL 'DON LA CHO GA CHA LAG TSANG BA LA DGONGS SHING, LHAG PAR TSES 'DAS DGE BSNYEN RING DPAL MO'I YAR 'DREN GYI PHYIR DU DMIGS NAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS SHES BKA' NAN CHE BAR PHEBS PA LTAR LAM 'DI LA MOS PA'I BLO CAN SKU SKYE RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN MING GZHAN, ,RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO'I BKA' LUNG GIS DZA YA PAndI TA KHU THUG THU ZHES 'BOD PAS 'PHAGS YUL DU BHA WA ZHES 'BOD CING, RGYA NAG GI YUL GRUR GYA ZU'I ZHES GRAGS PA DNGOS PO ZHES SHING PHO KHYE LOS HOR ZLA DANG PO PHYI MA'I BCU DGU LA SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
